item.description:
Waterman Grille Restaurant is situated on the East Side of Providence overlooking the Seekonk River . Natural tones welcome you inside while rich woods and stone floors complement the element of water that surrounds the location.

The menu is fashioned with creativity, the Waterman Grille Restaurant's menu marries the quality of fine cuisine with casual dining. Choose from an extensive array of small plates featuring wood-fire grilled specialties and seasonal comfort food, coupled with the flavors of locally grown and organic produce, paired with a fine selection from our boutique wine list. 

Click here for menu.

After our scrumptious brunch we will head for a nice long local walk.
item.name: Easter Brunch & Walk
